CustomField.description: Used for automated tiering of our customers. Tiers: 0 = Prospect, <20k = Bronze, <40 = Silver, <80k = Gold, >80k = Platinum, Key Account = KAM
CustomField.formula:
IF(TotalBookings__c >= TotalRevenueNet__c, IF(IsKeyAccount__c,"KAM",IF(AND(TotalBookings__c = 0, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Lost Prospect'))), "Prospect", IF(AND(TotalBookings__c = 0, ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Lost Prospect')), "", IF(TotalBookings__c < 20000, "Bronze", IF(TotalBookings__c < 40000 ,"Silver", IF(TotalBookings__c < 80000, "Gold", IF(TotalBookings__c > 80000, "Platinum","Bronze"))))))),
IF(IsKeyAccount__c,"KAM",IF(AND(TotalRevenueNet__c = 0,NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Lost Prospect'))), "Prospect", IF(AND(TotalRevenueNet__c = 0, ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Lost Prospect')), "", IF(TotalRevenueNet__c < 20000, "Bronze", IF(TotalRevenueNet__c < 40000 ,"Silver", IF(TotalRevenueNet__c < 80000, "Gold", IF(TotalRevenueNet__c > 80000, "Platinum","Bronze"))))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tiers based on bookings or total net revenue (if higher) 0k = Prospect <20k = Bronze <40 = Silver <80k = Gold >80k = Platinum Key Account = KAM
CustomField.label: Tier
